constraints.name: top_k_selection
constraints.description: 选取前 K 个最大值（根据成绩选择前 N 名学生）
constraints.formal: select top k elements from a list of scores

constraints.name: equality_check
constraints.description: 检查是否存在与给定值相等的元素（检查是否有其他学生的成绩与伊戈尔相同）
constraints.formal: check if there exists an element in the list such that element == given_value
